description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Proximity 2 is an simple, quick, yet deep strategy game where you score points by placing and capturing tiles! Challenge your friends with 4 player local multiplayer or team up against the computer on many different maps and modes!
description.short: Proximity 2 is an simple, quick, yet deep strategy game where you score points by placing and capturing tiles! Challenge your friends with 4 player local multiplayer or team up against the computer on many different maps and modes!
